examples: Let's eliminate the course on Akkadian hieroglyphics
the plague wiped out an entire population

definitions.text: dismiss from consideration or a contest
examples: John was ruled out as a possible suspect because he had a strong alibi
This possibility can be eliminated from our consideration

definitions.text: remove from a contest or race
examples: The cyclist has eliminated all the competitors in the race

definitions.text: remove (an unknown variable) from two or more equations
